main event: Several unidentified objects were reported over Long Beach, California on November 7, 1957, observed by both civilians and military personnel.
interesting points: Five or six round silver objects, erratic in movement, were spotted in the sky., The objects were about the size of a half dollar and visible for approximately 30 seconds., The sighting was later attributed to either an optical phenomenon or possibly aircraft., A ground visual was reported, with multiple observers including civilians and military personnel., Observations indicated changes in speed and direction not typical of known aircraft.
sighted object: five or six round silver objects
